rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with Vastu-aligned design for positive energy flow.
Mediterranean style living area integrated with dining space, large windows facing the garden and courtyard to ensure natural light and airflow.
A spacious Mediterranean kitchen with ample counter space. The placement adheres to Vastu principles by facing the north-east direction for enhanced energy flow.
A central open courtyard fostering natural ventilation and light. Decorated with native plants to enhance Vastu balance.

The duplex studio apartment section designed for privacy, featuring a living/sleeping area, storage spaces and a small bathroom. The layout ensures a clear separation between sleeping and functional areas.
A compact yet efficient bathroom ensuring essential fixtures with Vastu recommendations for water placement.

openings.description: A wide entrance door to welcome guests. Aligned in a direction that promotes auspicious energy.
Large windows ensuring natural light, positioned to maximize the view of the garden and courtyard.
Ensures connectivity between kitchen and courtyard for ventilation and visual connection with nature.

rooms.description: A serene master bedroom designed with Mediterranean aesthetics. The placement ensures calmness, aligning with Vastu by placing the bed in a commanding position.
A functional secondary bedroom, providing ample space while maintaining privacy and energy balance.

An expansive rooftop terrace offering panoramic views of the garden and surroundings. The terrace is designed with Mediterranean outdoor living elements, including seating areas, a small pergola, and greenery to promote relaxation.
A secondary bathroom accessible from the upper floor for convenience. Its design follows Vastu guidelines with water features positioned appropriately.

openings.description: A staircase connecting the ground floor to the upper floor, ensuring ease of movement and aligning with Vastu for energy flow.
A door leading to the rooftop terrace, allowing direct access from the master bedroom.
